name: Mutual - 2018
description:
A fast-paced casual mobile represented by colored shapes in a 4x4 tile grid. Given two endpoints, players must swipe to create a path, and the tiles in the path must have either the same shape or the same color. Players may only swipe in four directions. 
Mutual is a game developed during Global Game Jam 2018 @ FEU Institute of Technology by Team CMYK. For more information about the game: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/mutual
